title: Fps drops....
body: So.When i play League Of Legends it runs smoothly at 00:00 - 19:00 minutes in the game,And then at 20-30 minutes it starts to drop.My game runs at 50-90fps and then it drops to 10-20 and it keeps like that for 5 minutes,and it repeats the whole game.Thanks for helping.

replies.body:
This has been happening to a large amount of people. https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5yyicw/anyone_got_significant_ingame_performance_drop/?ref=search_posts

Myself, I'm going through support right now, but they haven't found a solution. I would be monitoring usage and temps during the game and nothing changed as far as temps.
Yea someone mentioned in that thread that it happened last season as well, my fps is dropping from a steady 142-144 to 90 mid fight.

After being in the game for 20 minutes, there are a number of extra resources that have to be used. There's a chance, that this could be due to corrupted game files. For example, Baron starts spawning at 20 min, which could be having an effect on your FPS. I'd like to have you go through our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)) to see if we can narrow down the underlying issue.

Hit me back up and let me know how this helps out!
Not a computer guru by any means, but if it's a time window thing, I would suggest checking on the Vid card temperature. Almost sounds like an overheating issue...
